name: Codename: Room
description:
Hello there fellow users of the internet!

 My name is not important but you can call me The Mysterious Voice. I understand that many of you have come here seeking an answer to the ultimate question of life; how can I prevent myself from feeling bored today? Well, if I may take just 10 minutes of your time I would like for you to be a test subject of my newest experiment. You see, my purpose is to give you a purpose which is why I will be referring to you as subject 243. You will be placed into a single room with only one entrance and exit. I will then come in and give you a series of instructions that I expect you to follow. If everything goes according to plan then at end of the experiment, I will let you go. Be aware though, looks can be deceiving and the room may not be as simple as it appears to be. I know this might sound dangerous but I assure you, we've done extensive testing and very few have died in the process. 

What is the purpose of this experiment?

Personally, I don’t like words such as purpose or reason but just know that there is one even if it’s not immediately apparent. Don’t worry, I’ve been told I’m a very trustworthy person even when I’m lying. Of course, you’re expected to treat this experiment with the seriousness it deserves so just let loose and go with the flow. 

But this is just a demo.

Of course, the full experiment isn’t ready yet, just a brief demonstration. It may be short but I assure you, there will be much more coming your way. Of course, this is a rather early version of the experiment so you might run into problems. If you do then please send an electronic letter to the individual listed on this electronic mail address.

BrandonMacleodGames@gmail.com

For more information, you can find updates on this Twitter thing (look, I don't know much about how these things work but if you follow the link, the individual who runs it will answer any questions you might have).

Twitter

And who could forget a YouTube channel thingy (whatever that is).

YouTube Channel

Alright, let’s begin.

Clear your mind and be prepared for anything. If you're ready then let's begin. 

CREDITS:

Created By: Me

Special Thanks: Two books and a shoebox
